event.title: Microsoft Events Catalog
event.description: A fully-searchable catalog of events conducted by Microsoft and their partners.

event.title: Microsoft Ignite
event.description: Until our next event experience, check out the latest learning opportunities, recent event highlights, and more.

event.title: EIGHT KB - Summer Edition
event.description: Free and completely online, the primary goal of this event is to deliver high value and highly technical, brain melting content that you'll be able to put to use immediately to improve your databse systems.

event.title: Dativerse
event.description: Dativerse is a new event in the Microsoft Data Platform space with the aim that all its speakers contribute to the diversity of the Microsoft Data Platform Community. We try to elevate those that are usually underrepresented at conferences due to their race, gender, sexual orientation, location or any other reason.

event.title: Data Platform Virtual Summit 2021
event.description: DPS 2021 virtual conference will cover all the time zones. With 20+ Training Classes, 150+ Breakout Sessions and 100+ World’s Best Educators – DPS 2021 is a focused learning event on Microsoft Azure Data, Analytics - Artificial Intelligence. Attend LIVE and get the recordings (12 months streaming access).

event.title: Data Saturday #11 Croatia
event.description: Data Saturday #11 Croatia is a free one-day event for professionals who use the Microsoft data platform. This community event offer content across data management, cloud and hybrid architecture, analytics, business intelligence, AI, and more.

event.title: Data Saturday #10 Sofia
event.description: Data Saturday #10 Sofia is a free one-day event for professionals who use the Microsoft data platform. This community event offer content across data management, cloud and hybrid architecture, analytics, business intelligence, AI, and more. We are planning event to be a hybrid event.

event.title: Data Saturday #13 Minnesota
event.description: Data Saturday #1Minnesota is a free virtual one-day event for all data learners and professionals seeking to learn.

event.title: Difinity
event.description: Difinity is the largest Microsoft Data, AI, Power BI, Power Platform and Business Applications Conference in New Zealand focusing on Data Platform, AI, Business Intelligence, Business Applications, Power Platform, and Analytics.

event.title: PASS Summit 2021
event.description: Join us for this free online Summit and connect, share, and learn with 1000s of your peers from the global data platform community.

event.title: SQL Server Live!
event.description: SQL Server Live!: Providing content for data professionals to do more with their Microsoft data platform investment. Sessions will cover performance tuning, security, reporting, data integration, and modernizing the SQL Server infrastructure.

event.title: Dev Intersection - Las Vegas
event.description: THE INTERSECTION OF CO-LOCATED TECHNOLOGY EVENTS: Microsoft SQL Server Azure SQL Conference and Azure + AI Conference
